import sys

a, b, c, d = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

print(max(0, min(b, d) - max(a, c)))

a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())
print(max(0, min(b, d)-max(a, c)))

a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())
print(max(0, min(b, d) - max(a, c)))

def main():
    # input
    a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())

    # output
    print(min(b, d) - max(a, c))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
